name: Cardslinger (Ryan Pratt)
description:
Armed with a six shooter, a brand new hat, and a whole lot of cards, Randal the bounty hunter sets out to right the wrongs in the crooked western city he calls home.

---------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

-WASD to Move,

-E to Pick up Items,

-R to Reload your Revolver,

-Right Click to Cycle to the next Slot of the Barrel,

-Left Click to Fire!

--------------------------------

A (prototype) made by Ryan Pratt
